      • checkRegisterNewLine

        public int checkRegisterNewLine(int ch)
        To deal with string reader task and uncertainty with CRLF sequence.
        Parameters:
        ch - '\r' or '\n'
        Returns:
        '\r' or '\n' whichever is registered for this session.

      • isInteractive

        public boolean isInteractive()
        Description copied from interface: Console
        Console is interactive when console's output can be used to communicate with the supplier of console's input.
        Returns:
        true when console is interactive

      • isReadable

        public boolean isReadable()
        Description copied from interface: Console
        Console is readable when is has non-NULL and not yet closed ConsoleInput
        Returns:
        false when there are no [further] read operations to succeed

      • sendProgress

        public final void sendProgress(String string)
        Description copied from interface: ConsoleInteractive
        Optional. Sends an undefined progress. Implementation dependent. Could be ignored, could print dots, could update busy indicator etc. Must support defer-buffering, could be called frequently, needs to be updated pretty seldom.
